pageContext.course_type_long_description: Tap into your imagination with tens of thousands of LEGOÂ® parts! Build engineer-designed projects such as: Boats, Snowmobiles, Catapults, and Merry-Go-Rounds. Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. pageContext.action_url_comment: You must be a student at Brown International Academy to attend this class. $18class X 13 weeks= $234
